title: No new Mosque in London and closed Muslim sects
text: Yesterday (17:57) fesuvious said: Just to bring some accuracy for those that say 'eff off back to a muslim country';The entire globe is Islamic. This earth, created by Allah is destined to be a caliphate. Islam recognises no other belief system, no borders. This isn't 'England' or 'GB', this is land created by Allah, to be populated by Muslims.Any other opinion is not valid.It isnt about benefits, or a cushy life. It isn't about living under democracy and being hypocritical.It is simply that all non-Muslims have no right to be here unless subjugated. We have no right whatsoever to operate man made democracy, or man made laws.There is only Islam, under Shariah, as set down by Allah.And us thickos need to understand that, because if we don't wake up to it they'll carry on doing it bit by bit, birth by birth, conversion by conversion.Disagree? Go read up. 100% agree it is a Muslims duty to convert others and spread Islam, currently the 2nd largest religion in the world but growing at a faster rate than any other
